<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>helper</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

  // THis uses the REST helper to save the attachment correctly.
  var mpREST = new MultipartRest(request);
  mpREST.setResponse(response);

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_momo_jira_integr/attachments/helper</operation_uri><produces>multipart/form-data, application/json</produces><produces_customized>true</produces_customized><relative_path>/helper</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>douglas.schamberg@movement.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-25 15:11:38</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>5d485a39dbe68450f25513296896191b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>helper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Jira Integration" source="x_momo_jira_integr">ec964aa3dbd2c810f25513296896194c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Integration">ec964aa3dbd2c810f25513296896194c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_5d485a39dbe68450f25513296896191b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>douglas.schamberg</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-25 16:17:41</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="attachments">ab185639dbe68450f2551329689619cd</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
